testsuite.name: (Delay)Validate Contact Page as Signed in User

step.actions: Open contact page, find "What kind of question do you have?",chose the second option "I want to know about pricing..." and then input valid email ,phone number, and the question. And then click submit
step.expectedresults: Msg will be submitted and there will be a "Thank you" msg shows up.

step.actions: Open contact page, find "What kind of question do you have?",chose the third option "I want to know about pricing/subscriptions" and then input valid email ,phone number, and the question. And then click submit
step.expectedresults: Msg will be submitted and there will be a "Thank you" msg shows up.

step.actions: Open contact page, find "What kind of question do you have?",chose the third option "I want to know how to use .." and then click the "TIBCOmmunity" link
step.expectedresults: TIBCO community should be open. https://www.tibcommunity.com/index.jspa

testcase.name: Submit message with invalid email adress

step.actions:
Input invalid email ,such as "test@test"

Input message like "I'm testing the contact page."

click submit
step.expectedresults: There is a warning message showing up,to tell the user something wrong with the email address.

step.actions: Open Contact pape, input valid msg and email ,then submit.
step.expectedresults: There will be a "Thank you " msg shows up after the message send out.

step.actions:
OpenContact page ,input valid msg and email adress,

then click "reset".
step.expectedresults: Email address input and Message input should be empty now.

testsuite.name: Validate Account Dialog as Signed in User

step.actions: Open account dialog. Click the "Manage account" at account Dialog.
step.expectedresults: Account info is open, and imformation of user is correct on that page

step.actions: Click the "Sign out" link at account Dialog.
step.expectedresults: User sign out , home page reloaded, there is a sign in link on the home page.

testsuite.name: Validate Account Info Page as Signed in User

step.actions:
Open account info page as a signed in user.(https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/login/profile)

click "edit profile" link on that page
step.expectedresults:
TIBCO Access Point sign in page is open 

(https://tap.tibco.com/storefront/sign-in.ep)

testcase.name: Submit message with invalid email adress

step.actions:
Input invalid email ,such as "test@test"

Input message like "I'm testing the contact page."

click submit
step.expectedresults: There is a warning message showing up,to tell the user something wrong with the email address.

step.actions: Open Contact pape, input valid msg and email ,then submit.
step.expectedresults: There will be a "Thank you " msg shows up after the message send out.

step.actions:
OpenContact page ,input valid msg and email adress,

then click "reset".
step.expectedresults: Email address input and Message input should be empty now.

testsuite.name: Validate Deploy Page as Signed in User

step.actions: Find "Evaluation environment" part on this page, click"Resend credentials"
step.expectedresults: There should be new email with password and username shows in user's email box.

step.actions: Click "View License Agreement"
step.expectedresults:
End user liscen agreenment pdf page should open up 

url:"http://www.tibco.com/multimedia/tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf"

step.actions: Click "on premises package" button
step.expectedresults:
On-premises pacakge page should be open up.

page title:On-premises package

url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/environment-detail

step.actions:
At deploy page, find"On-premises environments" part.

input name such as :test1

input url such as: http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml

input description such as: Test On-premises evironments

then click "Register" button
step.expectedresults: There will be a new and correct enviroment registered and show on this page .

testcase.name: Check "edit setting" link of new environment

step.actions: Click"edit setting" link of the new environment.
step.expectedresults: There will be a evironment editing dialog pop-up

step.actions:
At evironment editting dialog:

 input name such as :test2

input url such as: http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml

input description such as: Test On-premises evironments

then click "apply" button
step.expectedresults: The infomation of this environment changed correctly.

step.actions: Click "delete setting" link .There will be a "delete confirming button" pop-up, click it in 1 sec.
step.expectedresults: This environment should be deleted.

step.actions:
At "Deploy page", find"Evaluation environment" part.

Click "connect" button to skyway.
step.expectedresults:
There will be a skyway page open.Page title:Skyway

url: http://107.20.253.49:8080/skyway/

testsuite.name: Validate Develop Page as Signed in User

step.actions: At Develop Page ,click the video image
step.expectedresults: Video player loaded ,and video play without problems.

step.actions: At Develop page, click the designer download link,like:"TIBCO Cloud Bus Designer (Windows 64-bit)"
step.expectedresults: Download dialoug pop-up. Designer can be downloaded without problems.

step.actions: At Develop page, find link  "View License Agreement",and click it
step.expectedresults: "tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf" page is show up.url:http://www.tibco.com/multimedia/tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf

step.actions: Click "home" link on the home page
step.expectedresults: Home page should be reloaded.

step.actions: At homepage, Click the blue register button.
step.expectedresults: Register dialog should pop-up

testcase.name: Check "Sign in" link on home page

step.actions: Open home page and click Sign In link.
step.expectedresults: Sign in dialog pop-up

step.actions: Open home page , click "Pricing" tab
step.expectedresults: Pricing page should be open.page title :Pricing.page url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/pricing

step.actions: Open home page, and then click"Learn" tab.
step.expectedresults:
Cloud Bus Help Center page pop-up

(https://cloudbus.tibco.com/learn/wwhelp/wwhimpl/js/html/wwhelp.htm)

step.actions: Click contact link on the home page
step.expectedresults:
Contact page should open.

https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/contact

step.actions: Open home page, click "integrate" tab
step.expectedresults: Integrate page open .https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/integrate

testcase.name: Check "cloud bus end to end" video

step.actions:
Check the videos: "cloud bus end to end"

Open the video and then click the "x" button .
step.expectedresults: Video can play and close without problems

step.actions:
Check the videos: "why cloud bus"

Open the video and then click the "x" button .
step.expectedresults: Video can play and close without problems

testcase.name: Check Copy Right on Home Page

step.actions: Open home page.
step.expectedresults: Copy Right Text is correct.

step.actions:
Check the videos: Key Features,

Open the video and then click the "x" button .
step.expectedresults: Video can play and close without problems

step.actions: Click banner image.
step.expectedresults: Register dialog pop-up

step.actions: After logined in, open the name link on the upper right of home page.
step.expectedresults: There should be a account dialog pop-up

step.expectedresults: Develop page should be open. Page title:"Develop your environment"

testcase.name: Check "deploy" tab after user sign in

step.actions: After user login,  click "Deploy" tab on home page,
step.expectedresults: Deploy page should be open. Page title:"Deploy cloud or on-premises environment"

step.expectedresults: Subscriptions dialogue pop up.

step.expectedresults: Develop page should be open. Page title:"Develop your environment"

testsuite.name: Validate On Premises Package Page as Signed in User

step.actions: After login ,open "On-premises package" page.
step.expectedresults:
" Deploy your on-premises environment " page is open.

Page title:On-premises package

url: https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/environment-detail

step.actions: On this page ,click "TIBCO Cloud Bus Manager" download link.
step.expectedresults: File can be downloaded without problems.

step.actions: On this page, click "TIBCO Cloud Bus Enabler" down load link.
step.expectedresults: File can be downloaded without problems

step.actions: Find "License Type" part on this page, and click "View License Agreement" link
step.expectedresults:
License Agreement pdf should pop-up

url:http://www.tibco.com/multimedia/tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf

step.actions: Open url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/pricing
step.expectedresults: Pricing page should be open.page title :Pricing.page

step.actions: Open Pricing page,click light blue text "register for Cloud Bus"
step.expectedresults: Register dialog should pop-up

step.actions: Open Pricing page,find "What applications can TIBCO Cloud Bus integrate with?" click "here" link .
step.expectedresults: Integrate page should be open.

step.actions: Open Pricing page, find "For service definitions please see the TIBCO Cloud Bus Service document" ,click that link.
step.expectedresults:
CloudBusService pdf  Page should pop-up.

(https://cloudbus.tibco.com/licenses/TIBCO_Cloud_Bus_Service.pdf)

step.actions: Open Pricing page, find"How do I get started with TIBCO Cloud Bus?",click the email address "cloudbus-info@tibco.com" there,
Open Pricing page, at the bottom of the page,  find "If you have questions, email cloudbus-info@tibco.com" ,click the email adress
open url:"https://cloudbus.tibco.com/learn/wwhelp/wwhimpl/js/html/wwhelp.htm"
step.expectedresults: Cloud Bus Help Center page pop-up

step.actions: Go to Register dialog, click "continue"
step.expectedresults: Open TIBCO Access Point (TAP) -create an account page,url:"https://tap.tibco.com/storefront/idp/idp-create-account.ep?p=xxx"

step.actions: Open Register dialog.
step.expectedresults: The text on it states right. like :"To register for a Cloud Bus account, click Continue to go to the TIBCO Access Point (TAP) page. Your 30-day evaluationstarts immediately after the registration."

step.actions: Open Register dialog, click "why register" link.
step.expectedresults: Why Register page should be open (https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/why-register)

testcase.name: Login with valid email and password

step.actions: Input a pair of right email and password, then click "sign in"
step.expectedresults: User sign in successfully.Home page reload .There will be a welcome message like "Hi, xxx" shows up at the upper-right corner on page.

step.actions: Open Sign In link, input a wrong password and email address then lick "sign in"
step.expectedresults: Check the agreement if there is one, and then click "sign in " again.There should be a red message show up "The email or password you entered is invalid!"

step.actions: Open "sign in" dialog, click "Forget your password ?"  link.
step.expectedresults: TIBCO Access Point: "reset your password "page should open,url: "https://tap.tibco.com/storefront/forgotten-password.ep?p=xxx"

step.actions: Click subscribe button to Open subscribe dialog .
step.expectedresults: The text on the dialog should be like :"Thanks for your interest in TIBCO Cloud Bus. We will contact you soon. If you need more information you can reach us at cloudbus-info@tibco.com."

step.actions: Click the email adress on the dialog.
step.expectedresults: Should be able to send a email to that address.

step.actions: Open url " https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/why-register."
step.expectedresults: why register page should be open.

step.actions: Click the video image on this page
step.expectedresults: Video player is open ,Video play without problem.

step.actions: open url :https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/contact
step.expectedresults: Contact page should open.

Input invalid email ,such as "test@test"

Input message like "I'm testing the contact page."

click submit
step.expectedresults: There is a red message showing up,to tell the user there is some error with the email address.

step.expectedresults: There will be a "Thank you " msg shows up after the message send out.

step.actions:
OpenContact page ,input valid msg and email adress,

then click "reset".
step.expectedresults: Email address input and Message input should be empty now.

step.actions: Login with valid email and password
step.expectedresults: Home page for registered user is open,it contains "Develop" and "Deploy" tab

step.actions: Click "subscribe" button on home page.
step.expectedresults:
Subscriptions dialogue pop up 

"Thanks for your interest in TIBCO Cloud Bus. We will contact you soon. If you need more information you can reach us at cloudbus-info@tibco.com."

step.actions: On home page, click "Integrate" image.
step.expectedresults:
Integrate page should be open

page title:Integrations and QuickConnects

step.actions: On home page, click "Develop" image.
step.expectedresults:
Develop page should be open

page title:"Develop your environment"

step.actions: On home page, click "Deploy" image.
step.expectedresults:
Deploy page should be open

page title:"Deploy cloud or on-premises environment"

step.actions: Open Home Page, login in with an account registered 30 days ago.
step.expectedresults:
Home page reloaded,

There should be a statement like"Evaluation period expired" at "Subscribe" button.

step.actions: Open Develop Page (https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/develop) as a signed in user.
step.expectedresults:
Develop page is open.

page title:Develop your environment

step.actions: At Develop Page ,click the video image
step.expectedresults: Video player loaded ,and video play without problems.

step.actions:
At Develop page, click the designer download link,

something like:"TIBCO Cloud Bus Designer (Windows 64-bit)"
step.expectedresults: Download dialoug pop-up. Designer can be downloaded without problems.

step.actions: At Develop page, find link  "View License Agreement",and click it
step.expectedresults:
"tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf" page is show up.

url:http://www.tibco.com/multimedia/tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf

step.actions:
Open Deploy page as a sign in user.

url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/deploy
step.expectedresults: Deploy page should be open

step.actions: Find "Evaluation environment" part on this page, click"Resend credentials"
step.expectedresults: There should be new email with password and username shows in user's email box.

step.actions: Click "View License Agreement"
step.expectedresults:
End user liscen agreenment pdf page should open up 

url:"http://www.tibco.com/multimedia/tibco-end-user-license-agreement_tcm8-9378.pdf"

step.actions: Click "on premises package" button
step.expectedresults:
On-premises pacakge page should be open up.

page title:On-premises package

url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/environment-detail

step.actions:
At deploy page, find"On-premises environments" part.

input name such as :test1

input url such as: http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml

input description such as: Test On-premises evironments

then click "Register" button
step.expectedresults: There will be a new and correct enviroment registered and show on this page .

step.actions: Click"edit setting" link of the new environment.
step.expectedresults: There will be a evironment editing dialog pop-up

step.actions:
Click "delete setting" link .

There will be a "delete confirming button" pop-up, click it in 1 sec.
step.expectedresults: This environment should be deleted.

step.actions:
At "Deploy page", find"Evaluation environment" part.

Click "connect" button to skyway.
step.expectedresults:
There will be a skyway page open.

page title:Skyway

url: http://107.20.253.49:8080/skyway/

step.actions:
Input invalid email ,such as "test@test"

Input message like "I'm testing the contact page."

click submit
step.expectedresults: There is a red message showing up,to tell the user there is some error with the email adress.

step.actions: Open Contact pape, input valid msg and email ,then submit.
step.expectedresults: There will be a "Thank you " msg shows up after the message send out.

step.actions:
OpenContact page ,input valid msg and email adress,

then click "reset".
step.expectedresults: Email address input and Message input should be empty now.

step.actions:
Open contact page, find "What kind of question do you have?",chose the second option "I want to know about pricing..."

and repeat step3
step.expectedresults: Msg submitted and there will be a "Thank you" msg shows up.

step.actions:
Open contact page, find "What kind of question do you have?",chose the third option "I want to know about pricing..."

and repeat step3
step.expectedresults: Msg submitted and there will be a "Thank you" msg shows up.

step.actions: Login Cloud Bus as a registered user, click caret button besides user icon, at the right upper corner of this page.
step.expectedresults: Account Dialog pop-up

step.actions: Click the "Manage account" at account Dialog.
step.expectedresults: Account info is open, and imformation of user is correct on that page

step.actions: Click the "Sign out" link at account Dialog.
step.expectedresults: User sign out , home page reloaded, there is a sign in link on the home page.

step.actions: Open home page ,check the copy content
step.expectedresults: Text for guest user is right.

step.actions:
Check the videos: Key Features,

Open the video and then click the "x" button .
step.expectedresults: Videos can play and close without problems

step.actions: Click banner image.
step.expectedresults: Register dialog pop-up

step.actions: Check the videos:  why cloud bus
step.expectedresults: Videos can be visited.

step.actions: Check the videos: cloud bus end to end
step.expectedresults: Videos can be visited.

step.actions: Open home page, click "integrate" tab
step.expectedresults: Integrate page open .https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/integrate

step.actions: Open contact link on the home page
step.expectedresults:
Contact page should open.

https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/contact

step.actions: Open home page, and then click"Learn" tab.
step.expectedresults:
Cloud Bus Help Center page pop-up

(https://cloudbus.tibco.com/learn/wwhelp/wwhimpl/js/html/wwhelp.htm)

step.actions: Open home page , click "Pricing" tab
step.expectedresults: Pricing page should be open.page title :Pricing.page url:https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/pricing

step.actions: At homepage, Click the blue register button.
step.expectedresults: Register dialoug should pop-up.Check the text should state like :"To register for a Cloud Bus account, click Continue to go to the TIBCO Access Point (TAP) page. Your 30-day evaluationstarts immediately after the registration."

step.actions: Open home page, click why register link.
step.expectedresults: Why Register page should be open (https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/why-register)

step.actions: Back to Register dialog, click "continue"
step.expectedresults: Open TIBCO Access Point (TAP) -create an account page,url:"https://tap.tibco.com/storefront/idp/idp-create-account.ep?p=xxx"

step.actions: Open home page and click Sign In link.
step.expectedresults: Sign in dialog pop-up

step.actions: Input a pair of right email and password, then click "sign in"
step.expectedresults: User sign in successfully.Home page reload .There will be a welcome message like "Hi, xxx" shows up at the upper-right corner on page.

step.actions: Back to home page and click "sign in" link again, after the dialog pop up, click "Forget your password ?"  link.
step.expectedresults: TIBCO Access Point: "reset your password "page should open,url: "https://tap.tibco.com/storefront/forgotten-password.ep?p=xxx"

step.actions: Back to home page and click "sign in"link again, after the dialog pop up, input a wrong password and email adress then lick "sign in"
step.expectedresults: Check the agreement if there is one and then click "sign in " again.There should be a red message show up "The email or password you entered is invalid!"

step.actions: Open url " https://cloudbus.tibco.com/index.php/why-register."
step.expectedresults: why register page should be open

step.actions: Click the video image on this page
step.expectedresults: Video player is open ,Video play without problem.
